title: Hydroponics 101: What we grow | CropKing Inc.

subtasks: Mention other crops like tomatoes, cucumbers, melons
Demonstrate bumblebee pollination in controlled environment
Use Veggie Bee tool for indoor plant pollination
Highlight tomato growing conditions and support systems
Show Beto bucket system (Dutch technique) for vine crops
Compare NFT and Beto systems for different crops
Showcase cucumber size and plant growth in Beto buckets
Explain manual pollination methods (electric toothbrush, Veggie Bee)
Demonstrate proper tool usage for pollinating hydroponic flowers
Discuss importance of pollination for fruit set in hydroponic crops
Describe the tomato house setup at Crop King (indoor, controlled climate)
Mention benefits of year-round growing and extended season
Address pollination challenges in enclosed spaces
Highlight safety considerations (e.g., bee removal due to superintendent's decision)
